Disabled: Setting to true disables the module
AddDescriptionToTitle: If set to true, both title and description will be displayed for event in calendar grid
AllowTasks: Setting to true enables tasks-related features such as converting event to task and back
AllowShare: Setting to true enables calendar sharing capabilities (Aurora Corporate only)
DefaultTab: Defines default calendar tab. All the settings starting from this one are applied to new accounts, and can be adjust by users in their settings.
HighlightWorkingDays: If true, 'Highlight working days' option is enabled
HighlightWorkingHours: If true, 'Highlight working hours' option is enabled
WeekStartsOn: Defines first day of the week: 0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, 6 - Saturday
AllowPrivateEvents: Setting to true enables private events features
AllowDefaultReminders: Setting to true enables default reminders features
AllowSubscribedCalendars: Setting to true enables external calendars features
ShowWeekNumbers: Setting to true will make the system display week numbers in calendar-related dates
